TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit ObjectDisposedException extends System.InvalidOperationException

summary.span: 对已释放的对象执行操作时所引发的异常。

span.span: The exception that is thrown when an operation is performed on a disposed object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你尝试访问实现的对象的成员时，将引发接口，并且该对象已被释放。An is thrown when you try to access a member of an object that implements the interface, and that object has been disposed. 通常情况下，此异常由以下条件之一引起：Typically, this exception is caused by one of the following conditions: - 已调用对象的`Dispose`方法，并且你正在尝试访问的实例成员，获取或设置对象的状态。You've called an object's `Dispose` method, and you’re trying to access an instance member that gets or sets the object's state. 下面的示例演示当你尝试重置计时器通知的频率之后你调用, 时引发方法。The following example illustrates the that is thrown when you try to reset the frequency of timer notifications after you call the method. [!code-csharp[System.ObjectDisposedException#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.objectdisposedexception/cs/dispose1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.ObjectDisposedException#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.objectdisposedexception/vb/dispose1.vb#1)] - 已调用对象的`Close`方法，并且你正在尝试访问的实例成员，获取或设置对象的状态。You've called an object's `Close` method, and you’re trying to access an instance member that gets or sets the object's state. 通常情况下，`Close`方法提供类型的公共实现方法。Often, the `Close` method provides a type's public implementation of the method. - 已调用对象的`Dispose`方法多次。You've called an object's `Dispose` method multiple times. 通常情况下，这不会引发异常。Typically, this doesn’t throw an exception. 但是，根据如何实现一种类型，它可能不允许对多个调用`Dispose`。However, depending on how a type implements , it may not allow multiple calls to `Dispose`. 在大多数情况下，此异常导致的开发人员错误。In most cases, this exception results from developer error. 而不是处理中的错误`try` / `catch`块中，你应通过 reinstantiating 对象通常更正该错误。Instead of handling the error in a `try`/`catch` block, you should correct the error, typically by reinstantiating the object. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了将导致一个错误`ObjectDisposedException`引发异常。The following example demonstrates an error that causes the `ObjectDisposedException` exception to be thrown. [!code-cpp[ObjDispEx#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ObjDispEx/CPP/objdispexc.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ObjDispEx#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ObjDispEx/CS/objdispexc.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ObjDispEx#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ObjDispEx/VB/objdispexc.vb#1)] 此代码生成以下输出：This code produces the following output: ``` Caught: Cannot access a closed Stream. ```

summary.span: 使用包含已释放对象名称的字符串初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a string containing the name of the disposed object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性初始化为系统提供的消息描述错误并包括`objectName`参数。The property is initialized to a system-supplied message that describes the error and includes the `objectName` parameter. 此消息将当前系统区域性考虑在内。This message takes into account the current system culture. `InnerException`属性的新实例初始化为`null`。The `InnerException` property of the new instance is initialized to `null`. 如果`objectName`是`null`、`Message`属性包含仅错误消息。If `objectName` is `null`, the `Message` property contains only an error message.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因前一个异常而直接引发的异常应在 属性中包含对前一个异常的引用。An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the property. 属性返回传递到构造函数的相同值。The property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor.
